tour_name: Treasures of the Tropics: Sri Lanka and the Maldives

locations.name: Sigiriya
locations.description: Likely base in Sri Lanka's Cultural Triangle for exploring ancient cities and climbing the iconic Sigiriya Rock Fortress, especially for sunrise views.

locations.name: Nuwara Eliya
locations.description: Colonial-era hill station in Sri Lanka's cool highlands, famous for its scenic tea plantations and 'Little England' charm.

locations.name: Yala National Park Area
locations.description: Area adjacent to Yala National Park (coordinates often centered near Tissamaharama town), serving as a base for wildlife safaris to spot leopards, elephants, and other fauna.

locations.name: Maldives Resort Island
locations.description: Represents a typical private resort island in the Maldives (coordinates are representative, e.g., South Malé Atoll), offering seclusion, beaches, lagoons, and water activities for relaxation.
